analysis.description: Evolution is a flexible software foundation for rapidly prototyping, testing, and scaling new digital products without being locked into legacy architecture. It gives product and engineering teams a starting point that shortens time-to-market for new services and experiments.

valueProposition: Accelerates product delivery by providing a reusable, evolution-ready codebase instead of starting every initiative from scratch
Reduces technical risk by enforcing opinionated patterns that can adapt as requirements and scale evolve
Lowers long-term engineering cost by standardizing how new features and services are added over time

customerSegments.name: Digital product teams at startups and scale-ups
pain_points: Slow MVP delivery due to repeated boilerplate setup
Frequent rewrites when products scale or pivot

customerSegments.name: Innovation labs and corporate venture studios
pain_points: Need to validate many ideas quickly with limited shared engineering capacity
Inconsistent architecture across experiments complicating maintenance and handover

customerSegments.name: Software consultancies and agencies
pain_points: Pressure to deliver custom client projects faster while preserving quality
Difficulty reusing internal frameworks across diverse client engagements

revenueStreams.source: Commercial license for advanced evolution framework features
SaaS platform for managing evolution-based projects, templates, and upgrades
